job.title: Data Engineer - 100% Remote
job.description:
Job Title:
Data Engineer
Position Type:
Contract until December 2021 (2.5 Months)
Location:
100% remote, no travel, prefer Central or East Coast location since a lot of the team onshore work East Coast.
Primary Skills:
5+ years of developer/data engineer experience working specifically in Azure Python, Scala, SQL and/or Databricks hands on experience
Requirements:
At least 5+ years of developer/data engineer experience working specifically in Azure.
Must have python, scala, SQL and/or databricks hands on experience.
Should be independent worker but collaborate with necessary peers and deliver results incrementally by taking full ownership of tasks.
Daily duties:
1.     Gen 1 to Gen 2 transition
a)     Majority of their data pipelines are using Azure Data Lake Storage Gen 1 which is going to be deprecated by Microsoft
b)     Hence they need to migrate this to ADLS Gen 2 version
c)     Approximately, 155 data pipelines will be impacted from an ingestion pov and another 30 pipelines will also need to be updated in Refined data process
2.     Data Quality automation
a)     Today, they have several notebooks and scripts that perform aggregate quality checks for multiple sources
b)     Some of these need to be upgraded to use more current pipeline run information and also needs automation
c)     They will utilize ADLSg2 to store this metadata for reporting and analysis
3.     Functions optimization and Vacuum implementation
a)     There are Azure Functions based processes that needs update and optimization as each of them are running independently
b)     Opportunity to modularize some of these functions and as a result reduce overhead on system resources
